reservations.name: The Wharf Inn
reservations.description: A comfortable hotel located near Fisherman's Wharf with easy access to major attractions.

transportation.name: Round Trip Flight from Gainesville, FL to San Francisco, CA
transportation.description: Round trip flight covering the distance from Gainesville to San Francisco.

vacation.climate: Mild and pleasant with temperatures ranging from 55°F to 70°F.

day1.day_description: Arrival in San Francisco. Explore Fisherman's Wharf and enjoy the local seafood.

activities.title: Boudin Bakery
activities.description: Famous for its sourdough bread and delicious clam chowder served in bread bowls.

activities.title: Aquarium of the Bay
activities.description: Explore the underwater world of San Francisco with interactive exhibits and walking through underwater tunnels.

activities.title: Fish Hopper
activities.description: A popular seafood restaurant overlooking the bay, offering fresh seafood dishes.

activities.title: Visit Pier 39
activities.description: A bustling marketplace featuring sea lions, shops, and dining options.

day2.day_description: Visit iconic landmarks like the Golden Gate Bridge and explorations in the city.

activities.title: Café Trieste
activities.description: A historic café famous for its coffee and live music performances.

activities.title: Golden Gate Bridge
activities.description: Walk or bike across this iconic bridge with stunning views of the Bay.

activities.title: Mama's on Washington Square
activities.description: A popular breakfast spot known for its delicious brunch menu.

activities.title: Lombard Street
activities.description: Famous for being the crookedest street in the world, great for a photo op.
